title: Special Operations Infiltration Resource Planning
description: A planner must select the best infiltration method for a special operations team: a quiet electric vehicle, a helicopter, or a HALO jump.

tasks.description: Analyze the target area's defenses, terrain, and weather.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner has a clear understanding of the operational environment.

tasks.description: Evaluate the pros and cons of each infiltration method (e.g., helicopter is fast but loud, HALO is stealthy but weather-dependent).
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately weighs the trade-offs of each option.

tasks.description: Select the HALO jump as the optimal method because the target is heavily defended against ground and air approaches, and the weather is clear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner makes the correct decision based on a holistic assessment of the situation.
